title: So I'm taking some classes online over the summer (for college credit)
body: One of them was an ethics class and I had to write an essay. Now I'm a heavy procrastinator, and I postponed it until 3 hours before it was due. I managed to get it turned in with an hour to spare and I managed to get a perfect score. Now normally, I'd be fine with this, however, I'm trying to procrastinate less, but this only reinforced the behavior. How do I stop procrastinating?
